column1: urn:mpeg:dash:23003:3:audio_channel_configuration:2011|ISO/IEC 23009-1|/identifiers/references#23009-1|section 5.8.5.4|The URI `urn:mpeg:dash:23003:3:audio_channel_configuration:2011` is defined to indicate the channel configuration as defined by Table 68 (Channel Configurations
column3: mapping of channel elements to loudspeaker positions’) of ISO/IEC 23003-3. The @value is the value as defined  by Table 68 (Channel Configurations
column5: mapping of channel elements to loudspeaker positions’) of ISO/IEC 23003-3.

column1: urn:mpeg:mpegB:cicp:ChannelConfiguration|ISO/IEC 23091-3|/identifiers/references#23091-3|clause 6.2|ChannelConfiguration specifies the channel configuration. This defines the number of audio channels and their associated loudspeaker positions according to Table 8. The name
column3: and general position of each loudspeaker can be deduced from Table 7 and Figure 9.

column2: 2014:dash:audio_channel_configuration:2011|ETSI TS 102 366|https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/102300_102399/102366/01.04.01_60/ts_102366v010401p.pdf|clause I.1.2|Dolby audio channel configuration information. The @value attribute shall contain a four digit hexadecimal representation of the 16 bit field that describes the channel assignment as defined by table E.5 in ETSI TS 102 366 [14] where left channel is MSB.For example
column9: the value shall be “F801” (hexadecimal equivalent of the binary value 1111 1000 0000 0001).

column2: 2015:dash:audio_channel_configuration:2015|ETSI TS 103 190-2|https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/103100_103199/10319002/01.02.01_60/ts_10319002v010201p.pdf|clause G.3.1|Dolby audio channel configuration information. The @value attribute shall contain a six digit hexadecimal representation of the 24 bit field as defined by clause G.3.1 in ETSI TS 103 109-2. For example
column3: for a stream with an 3/2/2 (5.1.2) immersive audio channel configuration using loudspeakers L
column11: the value shall be “0000C7” (hexadecimal equivalent of the binary value 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100 0111).

column2: 2014:dash:audio_channel_configuration:2012|ETSI TS 102 114|https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/102100_102199/102114/01.06.01_60/ts_102114v010601p.pdf|Annex G|DTS-HD audio channel configuration information. The @value attribute shall be set to the total number of discrete output channels represented in the stream
column3: including LFE channels. The value shall be a whole decimal number in the range of 1 to 32.

column2: 2018:uhd:audio_channel_configuration|ETSI TS 103 491|https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/103400_103499/103491/01.02.01_60/ts_103491v010201p.pdf|annex D|DTS-UHD audio channel configuration information. The @value attribute shall be a string representing the ChannelMask
